TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AbsSeekBar extends Android.Widget.ProgressBar

Docs.summary: AbsSeekBar extends the capabilities of ProgressBar by adding a draggable thumb.

Docs.param: The amount to increment or decrement when the user presses the arrow keys.
Docs.summary: Returns the amount of progress changed via the arrow keys. -or- Sets the amount of progress changed via the arrow keys.
Docs.value: The amount to increment or decrement when the user presses the arrow keys. This will be positive.
